description:
This Serviced video will put a smile on your face!
Ivan clearly can't believe he is doing this video. He smiles through most of it, and his facial expression just crack me up. The disbelief is genuine.
But like all good Straight Guy Trying A Blow Job By a Dude For The First Time videos, something twists and Ivan loses it half way through.
He also was adamant that he couldn't cum from a blow job. And admit, he was a challenge. I was sweating and huffing pretty hard.
But I left the cumshot one camera angle all the way up, so you can see him going from mildly turned on to full on sexual convulsions. It's pretty cool to see it that way. And his reaction after the cumshot are priceless.
His bootie def. needed some make-up for his acne, but you will have to forgive him, he is after all still a teenager.
I'm trying to talk Ivan into coming back and working with a real model, so I am keeping my fingers crossed. This video showed him that he can get off with a guy, and I think he may actually consider it.
title: Bryan & Ivan - Serviced
